message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I understand you want a larger share, but the value decreases for me each round. How about a more even split this time?
Considering the inflation, I'll offer a bit less than last time, but still more than you offered me.
This is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to settle this before the inflation hurts me more.
I see you're getting anxious about the inflation, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Meet me in the middle of our previous offers.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a compromise closer to your preference. Let's settle this before the inflation makes this pointless for both of us.
I see you're willing to compromise, but I still think I can get a better deal. This is my new offer.
